  • Introduction to AngularJS

    24 Oct 2016

    What is Angular ? AngularJS is a powerful open source JavaScript framework for web applications. It was originally developed in 2009 by Misko Hevery and Adam Abrons. It is now maintained by Google. Advantages AngularJS allows you to use MVC (Model View Controller), which means you can do a website...
